name: Waterfall + Geyser + Floodgate
author: support@geysermc.org
description:
Waterfall is a fork of the well-known BungeeCord server teleportation suite.

This customization installs the GeyserMC and Floodgate plugins, which allows Bedrock players to connect without needing a Java account.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Paper Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq
mkdir -p /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server
if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
echo -e "using supplied download url"
DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
if [ -z "$VANILLA_VERSION" ] || [ "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
echo -e "getting latest supported mc version and latest paper build"
MINECRAFT_VERSION=$(curl -s https://papermc.io/api/v1/waterfall | jq -r '.versions[0]')
BUILD_NUMBER=$(curl -sSL https://papermc.io/api/v1/waterfall/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds.latest')
VER_EXISTS=true
else
echo -e "checking if version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION} exists"
VER_EXISTS=$(curl -s https://papermc.io/api/v1/waterfall | jq -r --arg VERSION ${MINECRAFT_VERSION} '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep true)
fi
if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
echo -e "Version is valid. Using version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
else
echo -e "Using the latest waterfall version"
MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_WATERFALL_VERSION}
fi
BUILD_EXISTS=$(curl -sSL https://papermc.io/api/v1/waterfall/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds.all[] | contains($BUILD)' | grep true)
if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ] || [ ${BUILD_NUMBER} == "latest" ]; then
echo -e "Build is valid. Using version ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
else
echo -e "Using the latest paper build for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
BUILD_NUMBER=$(curl -sSL https://papermc.io/api/v1/waterfall/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds.latest')
fi
echo "Version being downloaded"
echo -e "MC Version: ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
echo -e "Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://papermc.io/api/v1/waterfall/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/${BUILD_NUMBER}/download
fi
if [ -z ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
SERVER_JARFILE=server.jar
fi
if [[ ! $SERVER_JARFILE = *\.jar ]]; then
SERVER_JARFILE="$SERVER_JARFILE.jar"
fi
echo -e "running curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}
if [ ! -f config.yml ]; then
echo -e "Downloading waterfall config.yml"
curl -o config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/proxy/java/waterfall/config.yml
else
echo -e "Waterfall config.yml exists. Will not pull a new file"
fi
echo -e "Downloading Geyser and Floodgate"
mkdir -p plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/
curl -o plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord.jar https://ci.nukkitx.com/job/GeyserMC/job/Geyser/job/master/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/bootstrap/spigot/target/Geyser-BungeeCord.jar
curl -o plugins/floodgate-bungee.jar https://ci.nukkitx.com/job/GeyserMC/job/Floodgate/job/master/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/bungee/target/floodgate-bungee.jar
if [[ ! -f "plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/config.yml" ]]; then
echo -e "Downloading default Geyser config"
curl -o plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GeyserMC/Geyser/master/connector/src/main/resources/config.yml
sed -i 's/: online/: floodgate/g' plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord/config.yml
fi
